column6:
Iiiiiiin this corner! Weighing in at 200 lbs. and wielding a microfilament whip that can cut through solid steel: the feared enforcer of the Maggia Crime Family, Blacklash! Aaaaaaaand in this corner! Weighing 500 lbs. (in armor) and defending Tony Stark's chauffeur, ex-boxer "Happy" Hogan, the Iiiiiiiiiiron Man! Ding-ding! Leeeeeet's get ready to.... Er, we can't finish that phrase because of potential trademark violations. But it rhymes with "grumble.",2008,5
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Ulises Arreola | artist:Scott Koblish | penciller (cover):Graham Nolan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Fred Van Lente
